name: Man breastfeeding his son in the company of his wife and a slave child
description:
# 7 - Based on "The bearded lady" by José De Ribera

Control and abuse will unleash, later, rampant violence

The mother waits patiently for the right moment

The two children, wonders of nature, are united by the same internal fire, the desire for revolution. They just don't know it yet
